description: Create a new blog post with proper frontmatter template
---

@content-reviewer Help me create a new blog post. Generate a template with:

1. Complete frontmatter with all required fields:
   - publishDate (today's date in ISO 8601)
   - title
   - excerpt
   - image path
   - category
   - tags array

2. Suggested content structure:
   - Introduction section
   - Main content sections with ## headings
   - Conclusion

Ask me for the topic if not provided.
